sen.j: 都岐沙羅柵（つきさらのき、つきさらさく、ときさらのき、ときさらさく）は、古代日本の城柵の一つで、越国におかれた。
sen.e: Tsukisara no Ki (or tsukisarasaku no ki, tokisara no ki or takisara saku) (system of stockades) is a josaku (an official defense site) in the ancient Japan and was placed in Etsu Province
Tsukisara no Ki (or tsukisarasaku no ki, tokisara no ki or takisara saku) (system of stockades) is a josaku (an official defense site) in ancient Japan and was placed in Etsu Province.
sen.cmt: punctuation
sen.e: Tsukisara no Ki (tsukisarasaku, tokisara no ki, tokisara saku) (system of stockades) was a josaku (official defense site) in Koshi Province during ancient Japan.
sen.cmt: FBに従って修正しました。ピリオドを追加

sen.j: 658年にあったことが知れるだけで、場所と設置・廃止年は不明である。
sen.e: It was only known that the josaku existed in 658, but it is not known where it was located, when it was established nor when it was abolished.
The josaku was only known to exist in 658, but it is not known where it was located, when it was established nor when it was abolished.
sen.cmt: wording
sen.e: The josaku is known to have existed in 658, but other than that, it is not known where was located and when it was established and abandoned.
sen.cmt: FBに従って修正しました。

sen.j: 『日本書紀』斉明天皇4年（658年）7月4日条に、蝦夷が多人数で都に来て位と物を授かったことが記されている。
sen.e: It was described in the items for July 4, 658 of "Nihonshoki" (Chronicles of Japan) that many emishi (persons lived in the northern part of Japan at that time) came to the capital and were given official ranks and things.

It was described in the items for July 4, 658 of the Nihonshoki (Chronicles of Japan) that many emishi (persons lived in the northern part of Japan at that time) came to the capital and were given official ranks and things.
sen.cmt: incorrect quotation use
sen.e: It was described in the entry for July 4, 658 of "Nihonshoki" (Chronicles of Japan) that many emishi (people living in the northern part of Japan at that time) came to the capital and were given official ranks and gifts.
sen.cmt: FBに従って修正しました。クォーテーションマークを修正

sen.j: このとき日本側の官吏も賞を与えられ、都岐沙羅柵造は位2階、その判官が位1階を授けられた。
sen.e: At that time, government officers on the Japan side were given prizes as well, with the rank of the saku-tsukuri at Tsukisara no Ki (perhaps the head of Tsukisara no Ki) raised by two ranks and the hogan (a person at the officail hogan position) by a rank.
sen.cmt: ””位2階”, ”位1階”を授ける”の意味が分かりかなましたので、ここでは、””位2階”, ”位1階”上げられう”の意味に解釈して訳してあります。”柵造”のの正確な意味は調べきれませんでしたので、"perhaps"をつけてあります。
sen.e: At that time, government officers on the Japan side were granted prizes as well as the rank of the saku-tsukuri at Tsukisara no Ki (perhaps the head of Tsukisara no Ki) raised by two ranks and the hogan (a person at the officail hogan position) by a rank.
sen.cmt: wording
sen.e: At that time, government officers on the Japan side were granted prizes as well, and tsukisara no kinomiyakko (a kind of government official) was conferred a rank of Ifutashina (the 18th position in the 19-level positions of the government officials) (位2階) while his matsurigotohito (hogan) (a person at the official hogan position) was given the rank of ihitoshina (the lowest position in the 19-level positions of the government officials) (位1階).
sen.cmt: FBに従って修正しました。

sen.j: これが都岐沙羅柵に関する唯一の記録である。
sen.e: This is only the record concerning Tsukisara no Ki.
This is only the record concerning Tsukisara no Ki.
sen.cmt: 修正なし
sen.e: This is only the record that mentions Tsukisara no Ki.
sen.cmt: FBに従って修正しました。

sen.j: 蝦夷の来訪は阿倍比羅夫北航の成果であり、都岐沙羅の柵造と判官はそこで何らかの役割を果たしたと推測できる。
sen.e: It was an accomplishment of ABE no Hirafu's northing that emishi came to the capital, and it is supposed that the saku-tsukuri at Tsukisara no Ki and hogan played certain roles in Hirafu's adventure.

It was an accomplishment of ABE no Hirafu's northern navigating that emishi came to the capital. It is surmised that the saku-tsukuri at Tsukisara no Ki and hogan played certain roles in Hirafu's adventure.
sen.cmt: wording
sen.e: It is surmised that the tsukisara no kinomiyakko and matsurigotohito played certain roles in ABE no Hirafu's northern navigation, which led to the visit to the capital by emishi.
sen.cmt: FBに従って修正しました。アポストロフィを修正

sen.j: 都岐沙羅柵が日本海側で当時の越国にあったこともわかる。
sen.e: It is also known thatTsukisara no Ki was located on the Japan Sea side, more specifically in Oki Porvince at that time.
It is also known that Tsukisara no Ki was located on the Japan Sea side, more specifically in Oki Province at that time.
sen.cmt: spelling
sen.e: It is also known that Tsukisara no Ki was located in Koshi Province on the Japan Sea side.
sen.cmt: FBに従って修正しました。

sen.j: しかしそれ以上のことは不明である。
sen.e: However, anything more than that is unclear.
However, anything more than that is unclear.
sen.cmt: 修正なし
sen.e: However, nothing is known other this.
sen.cmt: FBに従って修正しました。ピリオドを追加

sen.j: 位置については現在の新潟県にあった渟足柵と磐舟柵の中間、現在の新潟県と山形県の境界付近、秋田県の由利地方など諸説ある。
sen.e: Concerning the location, there are many opinions as in the followings: between Nutari no Ki (stockades) and Iwafune no Ki (system of stockades), both placed in present Hiigata Prefecture, around a boundary between present Niigata Prefecture and Ymagata Prefecture, in the Yuri area in Akita Prefecture, etc.

There are many opinions regarding the location: between Nutari no Ki (stockades) and Iwafune no Ki (system of stockades), both placed in present Niigata Prefecture, around the border between present Niigata Prefecture and Yamagata Prefecture, in the Yuri area in Akita Prefecture etc.
sen.cmt: spelling, punctuation
sen.e: There are many theories regarding the exact location such as between Nutari no Ki (system of stockades) and Iwafune no Ki (system of stockades), both in present-day Niigata Prefecture, around the border between present-day Niigata Prefecture and Yamagata Prefecture and in the Yuri area in Akita Prefecture.
sen.cmt: FBに従って修正しました。

sen.j: また磐舟柵の別名とする説もあるが、いずれも積極的根拠を持たない。
sen.e: There is an opinion that it is another name of Iwafune no Ki (system of stockades), but any of these opinions has no positive evidence to certify its correctness.
There is the opinion that it is another name of Iwafune no Ki (system of stockades), but none of these opinions have positive evidence to certify its validity.
sen.cmt: wording
sen.e: There is also a theory that it is another name for Iwafune no Ki (system of stockades), but none of these theories have positive evidence.
sen.cmt: FBに従って修正しました。スペルを訂正
